content: Before working on adding a counter to (no topic) message topics, I just wanted to confirm if this would still be required by zulip and if I should proceed with this issue. https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/10626

@Abhishek B Chakravarthi I think we're not decided on whether we actually want to do that feature as described. You're welcome to work on it, but probably most other issues that will get integrated faster.
Got it. I guess I could work on it later if you've discussed this further and decided on the approach (or if it is to be done at all).
